action.title: 安装APatch
action.set: echo 正在下载 wget -P /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/ https://hub.fgit.cf/Twmcy/Twmcy.github.io/releases/download/update/APatch_10442-4-g86e7698.apk APatch.sh cp /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/boot-apatch.img /sdcard/RootES

action.title: 保留APatch
action.set: echo 正在下载 wget -P /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/ https://hub.fgit.cf/Twmcy/Twmcy.github.io/releases/download/update/APatch_10442-4-g86e7698.apk APatch-Root.sh cp /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/boot-apatch.img /sdcard/RootES
